attributes.action: ban shops and other businesses from leaving their lights and business name illuminations on after they have closed and all persons have left the premises, to avoid wasting electricity.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
During the night, many shops and businesses leave their lights on (including the shop name being illuminated), despite having locked up and no persons being present on the premises.

This is a disgraceful and unnecessary waste of electricity and cause of pollution.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban shops and other businesses from leaving their lights and business name illuminations on after they have closed and all persons have left the premises, to avoid wasting electricity."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page12067.asp
